description: These Kajak Sport hatch covers feature double seals to ensure absolute watertightness. Moulded-in tabs allow you to fit a security line to prevent loss overboard.Fits P&H kayaks, Venture Kayaks, and many other brands.Bow hatch cover diameter is 24cm.Dayhatch cover diameter is 20cm.Stern oval hatch cover diameter is 42 x 30cm.
name: Kajak Sport Hatch Cover
